review: I just threw the darn thing in the trash. I've been using Roku for years, and I like the interface, especially for the MLB.com app. I put a TV out on the deck and thought I'd watch a little baseball via Wi-Fi with it, but the fire stick interface with MLB.com is maddening. It's hard to select a game, choose where to start watching the game, and imprecise in advancing through an archived game.  It works OK with Netflix and Prime, In general with fire stick, I find it difficult to know where I am on any given screen. I did fish it back out of the trash, but haven't used it since.
